name: Hook 'Em
description:
A game made in 72 for the fifth GDU Jam, with the theme "Use your enemies as weapons".

In this game, the only weapon you have is your trusty hook, which you can use to grab enemies and throw them at walls or smash them into each other!

Music and sound effects generated using Wavebots Editor.

You can read a little bit about the game here if you're interested.
